manifest.title: My App
note: set the name for your channel
set the version and build number for your channel
allows your channel to launch directly into a specific video
sends an authentication event to Roku each time an authorized user opens your channel
this will prioritize your channel above non-authenticated channels in the Roku search results
designates the file path for the channel icon image displayed on the Roku home screen
splash_screen designates the file path for the initial image to display when the channel is first launched
splash_color sets the background color when the splash_screen image is not full screen
splash_min_time sets the minimum time to display the splash screen in milliseconds
sets the resolution of the UI using comma separated values ex. fhd,hd,sd
allows the debug console (8080) to output the memory and CPU utilization for your channel
voice_roinput specifies that the channel supports voice commands
etc_seek enables the handling of the 'seek' and 'start over' voice commands
etc_next enables the handling of the 'next' voice command
